profile:
Turnbull Roofing & Renovations Ltd is a family owned and operated Professional Roofing Contractor, utilizing over 3 generations of Construction/Home Renovation expertise. With our friendly and knowledgeable staff, highly trained and professional installers, along with our competitive pricing, we guarantee to make your "Roofing & Roof Insulation" experience a positive one!

Turnbull Roofing & Renovations Ltd, is proud to be an accredited "Preferred Contractor" and "Top of the House Contractor" with Owens Corning Canada. We also hold "Authorized Contractor" accreditation with GAF Roofing Products Canada.

profile:
C-Star Roofing is a specialty roofing and siding contractor serving the commercial and residential markets since 1993. We are family owned roofing company licensed and insured in the Province of Ontario.

Our experienced personnel provides free estimate, roof inspections and detailed proposals. We provide high quality materials and 10 years labor warranty to ensure that you are 100% satisfied with our services. Our crews are experienced and professionally trained in the installation and repair and jobsite safety.

C-Star Roofing Inc will always provide top quality roofing job in the lowest cost. Our commitment and experience is our promise!

profile:

Voted #1 contracting company in Durham Region 2009, 2010 and 2011 by Durham Business Times. Received the 2010 & 2013 Business Excellence Award of the year from the Ajax-Pickering Board of Trade. profile:
2020 Readers Choice Platinum Winner.  
      
 Roofing with Hart appreciates those who took the time to nominate and vote . We look forward to working with you in 2021 for your roofing + needs , and earn your vote for the 2021 season.
Roofing with 20 years of experience.  Roofing with Hart is a family owned business. Our company aims to provide our customers from  Pickering to Port Hope and some surrounding  areas with a fair and competitive free quote.
The goal of Roofing with Hart is to ensure customers,  their home improvement needs are completed by staff who have expert knowledge in the Roofing industry while providing quality workmanship using asphalt shingles for Repairs and Full roof replacement. 
Roofing with Hart also offers specialty  features, Flat Roofing, Metal Flashing, Skylight Installation, Replacements, Siding Projects also considered.  
We value your business.   Please contact us roofingwithhart@gmail.com  (905) 419 HART (4278) for your free quote, to discuss your roofing concerns or change to materials or products  offered.
We look forward to you entrusting us with your Roofing + projects.

profile:
Finley Roofing is owned by Chris Finley, a third generation roofer with over 30 years experience in the industry and is renowned for his professionalism and consistency in high quality workmanship.
We service all of our customers needs promptly and efficiently, whether the need is a small emergency repair or a full roof replacement.  No job is too small or too big for our staff of professional tradesmen who are fully equipped and ready to help.
***
Your positive experience with us begins with your initial telephone call.  We will schedule an appointment for one of our professional estimators to visit you and provide you with an accurate written proposal for the work you require.  Our estimators are knowledgeable and helpful and will assist you with choosing the right building materials and colours that will serve your needs and enhance your home’s appearance.
***
We at Finley Roofing pride ourselves in recruiting, hiring and employing the best in the industry to ensure the highest quality of workmanship available. You can be assured that you will receive the same standard of workmanship as the friend that referred you to us. 
***
WE NOW OFFER FINANCING! 

Call for details and a free quote. 

ASK ABOUT OUR SPRING SPECIAL!

profile:
Moffatt Bros. Roofing is dedicated to providing a high standard of service as dedicated roofing professionals. We strive to forge lasting relationships with our customers by providing them with high quality and timely service and to never forget that our satisfaction; our livelihood is made possible by serving our customers.
***
We listen carefully to our customers so we can understand your needs, problems or desires and to advise you conservatively using our years of experience, resources and those of our partners in the industry. We take care to respect our customers and their property and take all means necessary to protect people and property from damage or injury.
***
Our workers are factory trained for installing many different roofing systems from many different manufactures. We can shingle your roof or make it into a metal roof depending on what you want. For information on our residential products view the Sloped roofs  section. For places with a flat roof there are a number of options that can be put on your roof. If you have a flat roof check out the BUR and Single Ply Membrane  sections. There are links to our suppliers on the products pages or you can look at the suppliers page and visit their pages from there. To view some of our previously completed roofs feel free to view the Projects page.
***
Moffatt Bros. Roofing is dedicated to providing a high standard of service as dedicated roofing professionals. We try to forge lasting relationships with our customers by providing them with high quality and timely service and to never forget that our satisfaction; our livelihood is made possible by serving our customers.
products: GAF Timberline HD Shingles, Many types and styles of Steel roofing systems, Industrial / Commercial EPDM, TPO single ply roofing. We also install Duradek vinyl membranes.
services: Moffatt Bros also offers a number of different services. We will come to your aid with Emergency Repairs, we can do a Roof Inspection on your roof for any possible damage or problems, and we also assist with Mechanical Installations. Visit the Contact Us page for information on how to get in contact with us by phone or email and feel free to contact us for any additional information you may require

profile: Hi this is PARKER ROOFING I have been in the business for 10 years. I worked for my fathers business. He has been in the business for over 30 years. I decided to open my own company. I have a lot of pride and really good at what I do, so that is why I opened my own company. I have a good team and we take a lot of pride in our work and always make sure the customer is always happy. I warranty all of my work and take care of all my customers.
specialities:
I specialize in residential and commercial flat roofing. 
- Shingles
- Flats
- TPO 
- EPDM
- Torch
- Asphalt repairs

profile: With over 15 years experience working in Durham Region and the surrounding area, Sheridan Home Improvements provides each customer with reliable and efficient service. We ensure that our customers receive the personalized service unique to their needs. Our qualified professional personnel are dedicated to complete your roofing and home improvement needs. We also believe that honesty and hard work ethics are key in guaranteeing a great job and a very satisfied customer.
